result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Mario Tyree Roberts

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Mario Tyree Roberts not in court, in custody.  Attorney John Mathew Krejci appeared by video for Mario Tyree Roberts.  Attorney Jon R Josephsen Jr. appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for Scheduling Conference. Defendant not produced. Defense counsel informs court that the defendant has a pending felony matter before Judge Ashley, Br 19.  Court has no objection to this matter being resolved with the felony matter before Branch 19 as part of a global resolution. Court will not accept case 22CF3484. Case adjourned for a status conference date to Br 16.
Status conference scheduled for December 15, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant's Notice of Motion and Motion for Speedy Trial.  (Mario T. Roberts - #2022010472, House of Correction, 8885 S 68th St, Franklin WI 53132).
Defendant's Notice of Motion and Motion for Bail Reduction.  (Mario T. Roberts - #2022010472, House of Correction, 8885 S 68th St, Franklin WI 53132).

Defendant Mario Tyree Roberts appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney John Mathew Krejci in court for Mario Tyree Roberts.  Attorney Patrick Franken in court on behalf of Jon R Josephsen Jr. for State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for Arraignment. Defense counsel waived reading of the Complaint and entered a plea of not guilty on behalf of defendant. Defense counsel further advises that the defendant is now in custody on pending charges, and requests a scheduling conference date. Case adjourned to Br 16.
Scheduling conference scheduled for October 28, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Mario Tyree Roberts appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney John Mathew Krejci appeared by video for Mario Tyree Roberts.  Prosecuting attorney Arthur Kenneth Thexton in court in person for the State of Wisconsin. 
Preliminary hearing proceeded.  Sworn for the State: Glendale PD Officer R. Browne. State rests.  Defense rests.  Defense motion to dismiss argued and denied. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial. Original information received and filed. Defense unable to receive a copy. Matter is set for arraignment. Case is adjourned to Branch 16.
Arraignment scheduled for September 19, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Mario Tyree Roberts not in court, defendant in custody. Abby Rockendorf appeared for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case set for a preliminary hearing. States witness is present. SPD has not appointed counsel. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for September 1, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 5.  Court ordered no possession or use of controlled substances without a valid prescription.

Defendant Mario Tyree Roberts in court with attorney Ashley Fard.  Defendant Mario Tyree Roberts in custody.  Gregg Herman appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Mario Tyree Roberts appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Grayson, Branch 16. Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold the defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for July 28, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
